title: If You Have Writer's Block, Maybe You Should Stop Lying
author: Not specified in the provided text.
date_published: Not specified in the provided text.
dek: Writer's block?  The real problem might be a lack of sincerity. This article argues that writers struggling to produce work are often avoiding their genuine thoughts and feelings, instead trying to write what they *think* they should.  The solution? Embrace your authentic self and write from the heart.
